title: This means more to me than actual gameplay
body: Having a cooperative team. You play with a team that is willing to take part of the blame, talk through strategy, think and work together it is so much more rewarding to win or even lose a game. Even though there are issues with balance and snowballing and all of that there is nothing worse to me than playing with a team of toxic flamers. I think if the community can eventually become a place where people are looking to be cooperative and flame less itll make the game significantly more enjoyable all around.

Unfortunately In all my time on this game, I see alot more of people who want to sacrifice the team for personal benefit which frustrates me to no end. Alot of players want to be the "Solo carry" (I prefer TEAM CARRY over SOLO carry) and they are willing to abandon or ignore thier team in favor of pushing the solo carry agenda (Teamfight breaks out, and yet rather than help the team, adc sacrifices the rest of the team so they can run off and chase a solo kill in another lane...who ultimately escapes. I am a Support main, I see it as as Long as I help get my team fed, my job is done. But then I get flamed and completely discounted because support is -not- a "Kill focused" role (I can go 0/2/19 and still be told how completely worthless I am as a support because "look at ur kills")

So yeah, it helps to work together, but I think there needs to be a push to change the focus of the matches from the Solo Carry "MY KILLS" to the Team Carry "OUR WIN"
